ItemTooltips.blink: Allows you to jump in on the whole enemy team and use Ravage.
ItemTooltips.gauntlets: More stating HP and damage, builds to a bracer later.
ItemTooltips.branches: Gives nice early stat points. Can be upgraded later.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good burst HP regen if you get low.
ItemTooltips.tango: Helps to heal you if you get harassed.
ItemTooltips.courier: Every team needs a courier, if someones else buys one, get wards instead.
ItemTooltips.bracer: Give good stats and helps you stay alive, can be made into a Drum of Endurance.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Every team needs a Mekansm, if no else buys one you should.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Protects the team form magic damage and makes you tankier.
ItemTooltips.refresher: A very good item since you can Ravage twice with it. However it is expensive and takes lots of Mana to use.
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: A good aura and active ability as well as giving you armor and Mana pool, don't worry if you never get the gold to buy it.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Gives you and your team Mana.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: A nice aura and good stats.

AbilityTooltips.tidehunter_gush: A very good ability through out the game, use it to set up kills.
AbilityTooltips.tidehunter_kraken_shell: Helps keep you alive and not get harassed in lane.
AbilityTooltips.tidehunter_anchor_smash: Allows you to do okay damage and reduce the damage enemies deal. You'll want to get this early if your in a lane to get kills.
AbilityTooltips.tidehunter_ravage: Your main contribution to the team, use this on the enemies to stun them all.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: No need to take this until you have to.
